SHORTTITLE  Kristin Lauter, René Schoof, and Michael Zieve: The number of points on a curve over a finite field

  • Course description: html
  • Schoof's Abuja notes are a good reference: dvi, ps, pdf.
  • Kristin Lauter and Michael Zieve have a three-part project entitled “Using class field theory to construct curves with many points.” (Kristin will supervise Parts 1 and 2 and Michael will supervise Part 3.)
    • Description: dvi, ps, pdf
    • Reference [6] in their bibliography: ps, pdf
